String to be used to separate text into checklist items (the default is "new line")
Show or not an hint item on bottom of the checklist
Phrase to fill the new empty line on bottom of the checklist
What to do when an item is checked?
Do not remove checked items when converting back to simple text
Show checks symbols when converting back to simple text (parsed also for converting again into checklist with previously edited checks)
